statements.__comment: Try to connect GitHub account to Human using email.
statements.query: MATCH (human:Human), (guser:GitHubUser) WHERE human.email = guser.email MERGE (human)-[r:IDENTITY_GITHUB]->(guser) ON CREATE SET r.firstseen = $UPDATE_TAG SET r.lastupdated = $UPDATE_TAG

statements.__comment: Try to connect GitHub account to Human using FullName.
statements.query: MATCH (human:Human), (guser:GitHubUser) WHERE human.name = guser.fullname MERGE (human)-[r:IDENTITY_GITHUB]->(guser) ON CREATE SET r.firstseen = $UPDATE_TAG SET r.lastupdated = $UPDATE_TAG
